alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:21PM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Northern Oneida County. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Steadier precipitation has ended, but additional off and on showers, possibly falling as freezing rain, will move back into the area later this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be found at 511ny.org or by dialing 5-1-1.
